definitions.definition: the action of deducting or subtracting something.
examples: the dividend will be paid without deduction of tax

definitions.definition: an amount that is or may be deducted from something, especially from taxable income or tax to be paid.
the inference of particular instances by reference to a general law or principle.
examples: the detective must uncover the murderer by deduction from facts
synonyms: reasoning; archaicillation "she was right in her deduction"
